item.title: What Happened Between Skye & Gemma In Smile 2?
item.description: In Smile 2, Skye confides in her friend Gemma about what is going on with the Entity, yet Skye and Gemma donâ€™t have the most easygoing friendship.

item.title: 10 Must-See Sci-Fi Movies That Don't Rely On Impressive Special Effects
item.description: While big-budget sci-fi films often headline the box office, there are many that make the most with much less and have become must-watch movies.

item.title: "You Can't Do This!": Keanu Reeves Defended John Wick's Biggest Plot Point From Financiers
item.description: John Wick Directors Chad Stahelski and David Leitch reveal the franchise's crucial plot point was saved from being cut by star Keanu Reeves.
